website_summaries.verdict: A cool LEGO toy that combines a traditional building set with technology for hours of imaginative play.
pros: In addition to a fun shipwreck theme, this LEGO set comes with access to an app for adding a new dimension of creative play to this classic toy
Set includes four minifigures, a dog, and an alligator
cons: Some reports of app issues, but it's easy for kids to navigate once the bugs are worked out

customer_reviews.title: Yikes!
customer_reviews.text: This LEGO series is so cool. I haven’t even tried the AR component. The ghoulish sea captain and albino alligator are two of the coolest elements I have seen in a while. The shrimp boat itself is charming and the splitting shipwreck feature is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Zgonzo

customer_reviews.title: Wrecked shrimp boat
customer_reviews.text: I just got my set. I know I am going to love it. I have been waiting for the release since the toy fair unveiled this set.
customer_reviews.author: StanleyMeow

customer_reviews.title: Easy small set, little lacking for the price
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME AMAZING SET THAT I LOVE, but the built in price increase for the app leaves the set a little weak in the pieces. other than that, another great Lego set
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: APP doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: APP doesn't work on any of my android devices, so just standard legos, and sad 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Joe66

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love legos, so anything we can do to enhance that experience is great! We don't let our kids have free reign on our phones or tablets, but they love to use them with the legos when they get the chance. We got this as a Christmas gift for the kids, so they haven't opened it yet. I will update the review once it is built and kids can really have a chance to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Now there be a motley looking crew
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this Lego set with the character and personality of the shrimp boat with all the minifigs... even more with my own personal addition (not included with the set) of Capt. Jack Sparrow to the crew.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas I Abramovitz

customer_reviews.title: Cool build, boring AR
customer_reviews.text: They're nice builds with some cool pieces but the actual augmenting is not as cool as we thought it'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Drake

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. Since we live in an area where shrimp boats are a normal site this was a great addition to the collection of legos we, our kids and now grandkids own. Clear instructions are included , baggies of blocks are marked, the colors on the blocks are all great and non were miss-shapen to cause issued when building. Great price for a great quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Greendrgon

customer_reviews.title: Next level Legos
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old loved it, not a big set, but cool interactive story line - you need a tablet or phone to download the app. We thought it would be fun for making stop motion stories, which the kid has recently gotten into.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set, very detailed and my son loves it. Goes well with the seafood restaurant set from Hidden Side. The only irritating thing is that the black floats(?) you attach to the side pop off a lot when he plays with it. But we are fans of this series.
customer_reviews.author: Seeka Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking, but the app gets old in 5 mins
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the app gets super boring super fast. It's also kinda hard to play and kinda maybe me car/sea sick. Takes too long to get through things and get rewards for how bad the game is. Maybe they will make it a faster pace with faster rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Aurores

customer_reviews.title: Great build!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old built this by himself with no issues! We just figured out the interactive portion and he’s been hooked! How he wants more sets to build so he can access them! Scary but not too scary!
customer_reviews.author: LnASmom

customer_reviews.title: A great lego ship wreck set
customer_reviews.text: It is great to make a spooky ship wreck! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything Is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Legos pretty much speak for themselves. I did compare price to walmart and it was the same for me in my area so it's nice to be able to avoid that store and just buy from here!
customer_reviews.author: LadyO

customer_reviews.title: Great play
customer_reviews.text: So much fun and playability. Works like all lego but also has an app that you can use your phone to hunt ghosts. A great addition to any lego set.
customer_reviews.author: JeffRuLz

customer_reviews.title: Legos always legit
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Lego. The box came all smashed. But It was prob. The way the mail carrier handled it. I bought it for a gift an that was the only bad part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for water play.
customer_reviews.text: Fun project for my marine life lover. Only drawback is that it doesn’t float in the bath tub like some other LEGO boats do. Disappointed, but still a Lego Lover.
customer_reviews.author: CindyS CA

customer_reviews.title: Tentacles not colored
customer_reviews.text: My son is writing this review: Tentacles didn't have color, thats the only disappointment, but it was GOOD! Fast shipping ! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much

customer_reviews.title: Fun theme and build

product_meta.title: LEGO Hidden Side Wrecked Shrimp Boat 70419 Building Kit, App Toy for 7+ Year Old Boys and Girls, Interactive Augmented Reality Playset (310 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Immerse youngsters in fun ghost-catching adventures with this LEGO Hidden Side 70419 Wrecked Shrimp Boat playset. This awesome playset combines a buildable LEGO model with a game app for kids to deliver a fully interactive play experience. Download the app and scan the model with a phone to make it come alive. With continuous updates, a unique boss ghost to battle in each set, new mysteries to solve, cool items to find and ghosts to defeat and collect, this LEGO Hidden Side set takes LEGO play to a new dimension! With a toy shrimp boat that splits in two and a haunted, brick-built cliff, this building toy for kids is full of cool details to kick-start hours of imaginative play. The 2 hero minifigures, haunted captain and son minifigures, cute ghost dog figure and albino alligator figure adds a lot of fun play-starters.
feature_bullets: Introduce youngsters to the exciting world of LEGO Hidden Side: A unique play experience that combines the open creative play of LEGO building toys for kids with an augmented reality app

A great boys’ and girls’ birthday, Christmas or occasional gift, the Wrecked Shrimp Boat playset lets kids build their very own nautically-inspired shrimp boat that can split into two for hours of fun

This augmented reality toy for kids includes 4 minifigures: Jack Davids and Parker L. Jackson with smartphones, Captain Jones and Jones Jr., plus the ghost dog, Spencer, and an albino alligator for ghost-hunting adventures
A tablet or mobile phone is required to get the full interactive play experience, but not included. Compatible with selected iOS and Android devices. Compatible with select mobile devices
Ghost playset for boys and girls aged 7+ This Wrecked Shrimp Boat 70419 toy building set can be built together with all other original LEGO toys and LEGO bricks for creative play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,828 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
